data.name: Slugma
data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Grass Fire
attacks.text: Discard a Grass Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Magma Ring
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Magma Ring
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

abilities.name: Active Volcano
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, attach it to Slugma. This power can't be used if Slugma is affected by a Special Condition.

data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

attacks.name: Luring Flame
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. The new Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Magma Ring
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Slugma
data.flavorText: This Pokémon is often seen crawling around in volcanic regions.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

attacks.name: Scorching Lava
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Slugma in order to use this attack. The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Draw In
attacks.text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Roasting Heat
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Burned, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

data.name: Slugma

attacks.name: Hot Magma
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: It's said that in ancient times, when volcanoes were more active, there were many more Slugma than there are now.

data.name: Ethan's Slugma
data.flavorText: Its lava body can cool and chip away at times, but a magma bath will heal it right up.
